journal: Biology of Blood and Marrow Transplantation
title: Erratum to: “Reduced-Intensity Conditioning Combined with 188Rhenium Radioimmunotherapy before Allogeneic Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplantation in Elderly Patients with Acute Myeloid Leukemia: The Role of in Vivo T Cell Depletion” [Biol Blood Marrow Transplant 2015;21:1754-1760]
